section.title: Submit button label
section.description: Specifies the label of the submit button.

section.title: Submit button in-line style
section.description: Specify the in-line style for the Submit button.
section.tip: To hide the button, set the style to *[css:display:none;]*.

section.title: Delete record control
section.description: Defines the control used to delete records. The delete record control can be a checkbox or an icon. The control is added to each row in the Grid. section.title: Delete check box label
section.description: Specifies the label of the delete check box.

section.title: Allow 'delete-all' checkbox
section.description: If checked, a checkbox will be displayed next to the Delete checkbox label in the Grid header. The checkbox can be used to select or unselect the delete checkbox in every row on the current page of the Grid.

section.title: Has 'Cancel' button
section.description: Specifies whether the grid has a cancel button.

section.title: Cancel button label
section.description: Appears if Has Cancel button is selected. Specifies the label of the cancel button.

section.title: Cancel button in-line style
section.description: Specify the in-line style for the Cancel button.
section.tip: To hide the button, set the style to *[css:display:none;]*.

section.title: Confirm before submit
section.description: Specifies whether the user must confirm changes before they are submitted.

section.title: Confirm message
section.description: The message displayed in the confirm message box.

section.title: Target page
section.description: The next page to display if the update is successful. Clicking the button next to the Target page property will display the Specify Target Page dialog. The Target page can be a specified full URL, return to 'this' page, or a .A5W or .HTML page from your project. Make a selection and click OK. The target page will appear if the update is successful.

section.title: Auto-increment field label
section.description: The value shown for auto-increment fields when entering new records. The default is "Auto".
